snippet: American Airlines has canceled dozens of flights as it scrambles to fix seats that could pop loose during flight.
abstract: American Airlines cancels dozens of flights as it scrambles to fix seats that could pop loose during flight.
lead_paragraph: American Airlines has canceled dozens of flights as it scrambles to fix seats that could pop loose during flight.

headline.seo: Texas: American Airlines Flights Grounded to Fix Loose Seats
headline.main: Texas: Flights Canceled to Fix Loose Seats
headline.print_headline: Texas: Planes Grounded To Fix Loose Seats
